body.p: When an entity displays its financial statements or other financial information in a currency that is different from either its functional currency or its presentation currency and the requirements of paragraph 55 are not met, it shall:

li.p: clearly identify the information as supplementary information to distinguish it from the information that complies with IFRSs;
disclose the currency in which the supplementary information is displayed; and
disclose the entity’s functional currency and the method of translation used to determine the supplementary information.
